member.name: T:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Controls.RelativeAnimatingContentControl
member.summary: The platform does not currently support relative sized translation values. This primitive control walks through visual state animation storyboards and looks for identifying values to use as percentages.

member.name: F:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Controls.RelativeAnimatingContentControl.SimpleDoubleComparisonEpsilon
member.summary: A simple Epsilon-style value used for trying to determine if a double has an identifying value.

member.name: F:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Controls.RelativeAnimatingContentControl._knownWidth
member.summary: The last known width of the control.

member.name: F:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Controls.RelativeAnimatingContentControl._knownHeight
member.summary: The last known height of the control.

member.name: F:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Controls.RelativeAnimatingContentControl._specialAnimations
member.summary: A set of custom animation adapters used to update the animation storyboards when the size of the control changes.

member.name: M:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Controls.RelativeAnimatingContentControl.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the RelativeAnimatingContentControl type.

member.name: M:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Controls.RelativeAnimatingContentControl.OnSizeChanged(System.Object,System.Windows.SizeChangedEventArgs)
member.summary: Handles the size changed event.

member.name: M:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Controls.RelativeAnimatingContentControl.UpdateAnyAnimationValues
member.summary: Walks through the known storyboards in the control's template that may contain identifying values, storing them for future use and updates.

member.name: M:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Controls.RelativeAnimatingContentControl.UpdateKnownAnimations
member.summary: Walks through all special animations, updating based on the current size of the control.

member.summary: Processes a double animation with keyframes, looking for known special values to store with an adapter.
member.param: The double animation using key frames instance.

member.name: M:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Controls.RelativeAnimatingContentControl.ProcessDoubleAnimation(System.Windows.Media.Animation.DoubleAnimation)
member.summary: Processes a double animation looking for special values.

member.summary: A selection of dimensions of interest for updating an animation.

member.summary: The width (horizontal) dimension.

member.name: F:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Controls.RelativeAnimatingContentControl.DoubleAnimationDimension.Height
member.summary: The height (vertical) dimension.

member.name: T:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Controls.RelativeAnimatingContentControl.AnimationValueAdapter
member.summary: A simple class designed to store information about a specific animation instance and its properties. Able to update the values at runtime.

member.name: M:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Controls.RelativeAnimatingContentControl.AnimationValueAdapter.#ctor(FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Controls.RelativeAnimatingContentControl.DoubleAnimationDimension)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the AnimationValueAdapter type.
member.param: The dimension of interest for updates.

member.name: M:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Controls.RelativeAnimatingContentControl.AnimationValueAdapter.UpdateWithNewDimension(System.Double,System.Double)
member.summary: Updates the original instance based on new dimension information from the control. Takes both and allows the subclass to make the decision on which ratio, values, and dimension to use.

member.summary: Gets or sets the original double value.

member.name: P:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Controls.RelativeAnimatingContentControl.AnimationValueAdapter.Dimension
member.summary: Gets the dimension of interest for the control.

member.name: M:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Controls.RelativeAnimatingContentControl.GeneralAnimationValueAdapter`1.GetValue
member.summary: Gets the value of the underlying property of interest.
member.returns: Returns the value of the property.

member.summary: Sets the value for the underlying property of interest.
member.param: The new value for the property.

member.name: F:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Controls.RelativeAnimatingContentControl.GeneralAnimationValueAdapter`1._ratio
member.summary: The ratio based on the original identifying value, used for computing the updated animation property of interest when the size of the control changes.

member.summary: Approximately removes the identifying value from a value.
member.returns: Returns a double with an adjustment for the identifying value portion of the number.

member.name: M:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Controls.RelativeAnimatingContentControl.GeneralAnimationValueAdapter`1.GetDimensionFromIdentifyingValue(System.Double)
member.summary: Retrieves the dimension, if any, from the number. If the number does not have an identifying value, null is returned.
member.returns: Returns a double animation dimension if the number was contained an identifying value; otherwise, returns null.

member.summary: Updates the value of the property.

member.summary: Stores the animation instance.

member.summary: Gets the initial value (minus the identifying value portion) that the designer stored within the visual state animation property.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Navigation.DefaultLinkNavigator.Navigate(System.Uri,System.Windows.FrameworkElement,System.String)
member.summary: Performs navigation to specified link.
member.param: The source element that triggers the navigation. Required for frame navigation.
An optional command parameter or navigation target.

member.name: P:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Navigation.DefaultLinkNavigator.ExternalSchemes
member.summary: Gets or sets the schemes for external link navigation.
member.remarks: Default schemes are http, https and mailto.

member.name: P:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Navigation.DefaultLinkNavigator.Commands
member.summary: Gets or sets the navigable commands.

member.summary: Provides data for fragment navigation events.

member.summary: Gets the uniform resource identifier (URI) fragment.

member.summary: Provides data for the method and the event.

member.summary: Defines the base navigation event arguments.

member.name: P:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Navigation.NavigationBaseEventArgs.Frame
member.summary: Gets the frame that raised this event.

member.name: P:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Navigation.NavigationBaseEventArgs.Source
member.summary: Gets the source uri for the target being navigated to.

member.name: P:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.IsParentFrameNavigating
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the frame performing the navigation is a parent frame or the frame itself.

member.name: P:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.NavigationType
member.summary: Gets a value that indicates the type of navigation that is occurring.

member.name: P:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Navigation.NavigatingCancelEventArgs.Cancel
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the event should be canceled.

member.summary: Provides data for frame navigation events.

member.summary: Gets a value that indicates the type of navigation that is occurring.

member.summary: Gets the content of the target being navigated to.

member.name: T:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs
member.summary: Provides data for the event.

member.name: P:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.Error
member.summary: Gets the error from the failed navigation.

member.name: P:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Navigation.NavigationFailedEventArgs.Handled
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the failure event has been handled.
member.remarks: When not handled, the error is displayed in the ModernFrame raising the NavigationFailed event.

member.summary: Identifies the current frame.

member.summary: Identifies the top frame.

member.name: F:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Navigation.NavigationHelper.FrameParent
member.summary: Identifies the parent of the current frame.

member.name: M:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Navigation.NavigationHelper.FindFrame(System.String,System.Windows.FrameworkElement)
member.summary: Finds the frame identified with given name in the specified context.
member.param: The framework element providing the context for finding a frame.
member.returns: The frame or null if the frame could not be found.

member.name: M:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Navigation.NavigationHelper.RemoveFragment(System.Uri)
member.summary: Removes the fragment from specified uri and return it.
member.returns: The uri without the fragment, or the uri itself if no fragment is found

member.name: M:FirstFloor.ModernUI.Windows.Navigation.NavigationHelper.RemoveFragment(System.Uri,System.String@)
member.summary: Removes the fragment from specified uri and returns the uri without the fragment and the fragment itself.
member.param: The fragment, null if no fragment found
member.returns: The uri without the fragment, or the uri itself if no fragment is found

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Navigation failed.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to ok.
